sqlMap.select: select NUM,SUBJECT, NICKNAME,CONTENTS,NDATE from TB_UPDATE where NUM=#NUM#
select NUM,NICKNAME,SUBJECT,CONTENTS,NDATE,HITS from TB_UPDATE order by NUM desc
sqlMap.update: update TB_UPDATE set hits=hits+1 where num=#num#
update TB_UPDATE set subject=#subject#, contents=#contents# where num=#num#
sqlMap.select: select num,nickname,subject,contents,ndate,hits from (select num,nickname,subject,contents,ndate,hits, rownum rn from ( select num,nickname,subject,contents,ndate,hits from tb_update order by num desc)) where rn between #start# and #end#
